title: Game Client Bug and leave ban???
body: My client keeps on bugging out, and on 1/2 my games, right after I get into a game, my league client says it won't open, and it says "we have restored league to an older patch, wait a while for us to restore it", and then after that it won't let me log in. Then, I get a ban on my game that I afk'd for because I cannot log into the game. Come on man.... I play on a mac btw

replies.body: Hey there, we've been tracking this issue on our [sticky ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Oe3XBf34-incorrect-username-or-password)thread.  Before I offer any suggestions, though, I'm curious if this is still an issue for you?  Let me know.

Hello Viktor,

I would like to clarify one point that you made about getting a ban on your game. When you are flagged for leaverbuster it's not a ban but rather a delay before one can queue again. This article here https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ explains what I mean. I hope this helps you!

Also, if you're having issues with your league client and not being able to log in try the hextech repair tool here --> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool
